title: S1 E12: Mob Justice
description:
A mob lawyer rises to become Chief Justice of the Rhode Island Supreme Court. He promises to leave his past associations behind. But it's hard to part with old friends. 
For more information about this episode, and a full list of credits, visit crimetownshow.com.  
Our Sponsors

Squarespace – For 10% off your first purchase go to Squarespace.com and use the offer code "CRIME" at checkout. 
Trunk Club - To get paired with a stylist and receive a personalized trunk of your own, visit trunkclub.com/crimetown.
